doc.title: Day and an Arabian Knight
doc.plot: Day and an Arabian Knight is as film about two needy people whose circumstances bring them together in a city that has left them lonely and stranded. In one day and a night, Mohammed, a Lebenese security guard, meets and woos Day, the new temp. We watch through Day's hopeful eyes and heart as Mo takes her out on a date and even proposes marriage only to reveal his real need... a visa to stay in the country.
